QuestData.Title: Death to the Broodmother
QuestData.Description: We've located the matriarch's feeding grounds south of the Ascendant's Rise.$B$BShe will be extremely angry to have lost one of her drakes. Place the skull there near the carcasses she devours. If she's anywhere in the vicinity, she will come out and attempt to exact revenge.$B$BWe will have a surprise waiting for her.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Use the skull to draw her in.
QuestData.LogDescription: Place the Twilight Drake Skull at the feeding grounds south of the Ascendant's Rise and slay Desperiona.
